item.title: Tree is damaged problem, 19th September
item.description:
Boundary of your land with Wendlescliffe Development. Foot of Evesham road, Bishop’s Cleeve. GL52 8FU The boundary in question is at the back of the estate, at the end of Valentine road. ///stored.spun.inspector There are large tree branches overhanging our development along the boundary. Our maintenance contractors do not cut back at height. Some of the trees are willows and are susceptible to snapping. This will cause damage if it happens.
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Bridge is damaged/missing problem, 19th September
item.description:
Golf course bridge needs a safety "kick plank" which is missing. Dogs and people could easily slip into the brook. What 3 Words: breeding.resides.argue This bridge is located on footpath ECN1, a few hundred metres northwest (downstream) of Halfway Bridge, the first footbridge one comes to on Normans Brook.
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: The sign is illegible problem, 19th September
item.description:
16/09/24 email rcvd ::: On Saturday at the junction of Cheltenham Road and Old Cheltenham Road a large van travelling toward Longlevens on Cheltenham Road drove at speed ignoring the single No Entry Sign into Old Cheltenham Road causing a car travelling on Old Cheltenham Road toward Cheltenham Road to brake and swerve. I walked to the No Entry Sign to find it had been replaced with a new one which is too high and near a tree, you need to lower it and put a second sign to the left to make it obvious.
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Deep pot hole on the edge of the second speed bump as you come off PE way, 19th September
item.description:
What 3 words location is ///linked.island.works I wanted to report this as deeper than a tennis ball as it’s deep, and if you hit it as you come down off the speed bump it really does make quite a bang. I can’t call as I’m at work so please treat this as urgent.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 91, Shakespeare Road, St Mark's, Cheltenham

item.title: Overgrown trees on lane blocking sunlight on allotment area, 18th September
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Whitethorn Drive, Lynworth, Cheltenham

item.title: Tree is damaged problem, 18th September
item.description:
Customer reports that a mature tree at the location needs trimming back, as it is overhanging their drive. Branches and conkers are falling onto their vehicles; the conkers are a trip-hazard. Furthermore, tree sap is accumulating on their car.
Report on FixMyStreet
